snippet: We’re adding a week to our Summer Reading Contest to accommodate the many students who still want to post. We will not be formally judging this week’s entries, but we will be posting our favorites to our “Comments of the Moment.”
abstract: We’re adding a week to our Summer Reading Contest to accommodate the many students who still want to post. We will not be formally judging this week’s entries, but we will be posting our favorites to our “Comments of the Moment.”

headline.main: Summer Reading Contest | What Interested You Most in The Times This Week?
